data.title: How much do Golden Source International employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Golden Source International is estimated to be approximate $96,588 per year. The majority pay is between $84,946 to $109,221 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Golden Source International salary, Golden Source International pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at Golden Source International by Job Title BETA

The average salary of Golden Source International jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at Golden Source International. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. DevOps Engineer jobs at Golden Source International earn the most with an average annual salary of $108,329, while Accounting & Office Clerk jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $43,957.

The estimate average salary for Golden Source International employees is around $96,588 per year, or the hourly rate of Golden Source International rate is $46. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $109,221. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

JOB TITLE SALARY RANGE AVERAGE SALARY COMPANY NAME DevOps Engineer $97,657 - $119,055 $108,329 Golden Source International Accounting & Office Clerk $40,157 - $47,987 $43,957 Golden Source International

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does Golden Source International in the United States pay?

Golden Source International pays its employees an average of $96,588 per year. The average salary at Golden Source International range from $84,946 to $109,221 per year. DevOps Engineer jobs at Golden Source International earn the most with an average annual salary of $108,329, while Accounting & Office Clerk jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $43,957.

2. Do Golden Source International employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Golden Source International is lesser than Keracell Inc. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Golden Source International is $109,221 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Keracell Inc is $115,440 per year.

3. How much does Golden Source International pay compared to Keracell Inc?

The average annual salary at Golden Source International is $96,588, or an hourly wage of $46, in comparison to Keracell Inc which pays $102,083 per year or $49 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost an Accounting & Office Clerk salary at Golden Source International?

Accounting, Accounts Payable and Customer Service are key to an Accounting & Office Clerk job at Golden Source International. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at Golden Source International.

5. What is the lowest salary at Golden Source International?

The lowest paying job at Golden Source International is Accounting & Office Clerk with an annual salary of $43,957 or an hourly rate of $46.
